title: Decoy Jester

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Switch places with another player at night. Until the end of the following day, everything that should happen to them instead happens to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On Day 1, you become aware of any roles whose target must meet a condition in order to be killed by said role (ex: Hex Master or Arsonist).
- You will switch Defense values and investigative results with your target.
- You return unfavorable results to investigative abilities.
- You ignore Redirection Immunity.
- You cannot select the same player two nights in a row.
- If your target would be lynched, you are lynched instead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be dead before the last night/day of the game.
